title: Gtk-Message: 10:21:01.740: Not loading module "atk-bridge": The functionality is provided by GTK natively. Please try to not load it.
content:
Ol√°,

Obtenho essa mensagem de erro ao tentar abrir o Firefox no terminal do Ubuntu 22.04:

creator: luimoura

title: Disable popup after update
content:
I have no problem with Firefox automatic updating, but I have a problem with the irritating popup coming every time after every update. Why do you nag your users like this? And why is there no "don't show this anymore" checkbox? Why is there no close button and you need to click trough the 5 steps every time??? Is there any way to disable this irritating popup in about:config¬†?

I installed my first Firefox years ago to get rid of popups and now Mozilla is slipping them in our face. Not nice.
creator: katy5

title: Microsoft administration consoles and two saved logins
content:
Hi,

as an admin I administer O365 web-sites/consoles in Firefox. I have two accounts in Firefox: my normal account, and my admin account which has far greater rights. The problem I am having is since I have enabled the option "Allow Windows single sign-on for Microsoft, work, and school accounts" (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/windows-sso?as=u&utm_source=inproduct), I always have to confirm two times that I want my admin account to login to for example: https://admin.exchange.microsoft.com/#/ Is there a way to tell FF that I want only the admin account to logon to the specified link so I don't have to select the account every time?

Thanks
creator: atomic.delta

title: I want to put Zscaler Root CA certificate for web access by terminal
content:
Hi Team, I'm using the Zscaler in my network, when I use the Firefox, appear the error:

"Software is Preventing Firefox From Safely Connecting to This Site

www.googleadservices.com is most likely a safe site, but a secure connection could not be established. This issue is caused by Zscaler Root CA, which is either software on your computer or your network.

What can you do about it?

www.googleadservices.com has a security policy called HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS), which means that Firefox can only connect to it securely...." Picture 1

I have root certificate in path: /usr/share/ca-certificates/mozilla$ Picture 2

I run the command for updates CA but it doesn't work: sudo update-ca-certificates

Errors keep popping up.

The certificate not appear in the Certificate manager > Authorities Picture 3

But if I open the firefox > Settings > Privacy & Security> Certifcates > View Certificates > Import And I import the certificate ZscalerRoot.crt and I mark the option "trust this CA to identify websites" the firefox works, and I can open the site without error message.

Picture 4

And the certificate appear in the manager certificate: Picture 5


How can I put the command terminal certificate, which I have on hundreds of machines?

Note: I need to put the certificate only for internet access.
creator: walter.sena.m

title: getting access denied message when signing into groupon
content: This only happens on the Firefox Browser, Chrome and Edge are fine. Whenever I go to sign into my Groupon Merchant page, I get an "Access Denied" message. All the info on your support page shows there are solutions, but access to those solutions are not possible. Solutions online are years old and of no help. I am running the latest version of firefox.
creator: massoman

title: No Video with Supported format and MIME type found
content:
No Video with Supported format and MIME type found is not allowing me to play videos on website.

No idea what's the cause of it, I've tried everything from internet tips how to solve this.
creator: dawid.antczak

title: Downloaded image is in Microsoft Edge HTML format
content: When I download images from some sites, they're in MS Edge HTML format. Is this because the site dictates this, or is Edge somehow interfering in the download process? I've disabled Edge on Startup. Can anyone help?
creator: david324

title: Automatic Startup Firefox
content: I have recently upgraded my macOS to Monterey 12.6.1. Now, when I click a link in an e-mail or on social media, Firefox will not open. I must manually open Firefox on my desktop before clicking the link. I cannot find a toggle in Firefox Preferences to change this behavior. How can I change this?
creator: b.a.rosen

title: Cause of crash
creator: jan.prachar

title: how to delete cookies in my website
content:
Hello,

i want to ask when open my website in firefox the lots of cookies here. any support team member guide how to remove cookies from my website. my URL is here https://sawstrend.com/
creator: nana.rizwan0

title: Change Mail
content:
Hello,

I have a firefox Account "accountA" which has the primary eMail-Address "mailA". I had an other Account "accountB" with primary eMail-Address "mailB" and secondary eMail-Address "mailC". Sadly I lost access to "accountB" and it's primary Mail-Address "mailB" (which is ok) but want to change the Mail from "accountA" to "mailC".

However, this is not possible since "mailC" is locked to "accountB" which I can no longer access (since I need the primary Mail Address. This meens I can never again use "mailC" for my Firefox account, which is now my primary Mail-Address. Is there should be a way to disconnect a Mail-Address from an account, if one has ownership of this Mail-Address?

Sincerly Robin
creator: robin.gutoehrlein

title: XULRunner Error: Could not determine any profile running in backgroundtask mode!
content: I recently installed new pc with fresh Firefox Developer Edition. Then I transfered the profile folder from old pc to the new pc. All bookmarks, addons, etc is there. Just the XULRunner popup appears only on the new pc. I uninstalled firefox on the new pc again and reinstalled it with profile cleaning. After profile cleaning firefox got faster and addons got removed. But the XULRunner popup keeps appearing. When I go to taskscheduler and trigger the "Firefox Developer Edition Background Update CA9422711AE1A81C" again, the XULRunner popup appears. Removing this taskscheduler and Firefox keeps readding it and the XULRunner popup are back. Any idea how I can get rid of the XULRunner popup?
creator: simonbergi9

title: Site not opening in Firefox Browser.
content: When i open a site i.e. site URL, it shows a 404 error. How to fix this problem.???
creator: amiraliaa09

title: Remove wrongly suggested websites
content:
The autocomplete feature keeps showing me the US version of the KLM website when I type "kl" in the address bar instead of my local version. And I can't seem to get rid of it, or to get my local version instead.

How to control what is the first result shown in the address bar¬†?
creator: sim24

title: why youtube is not installing to my iphone?
content: i wanna download videos from yt about tramadol.to my iphone but when i tried to download from browser the error show on my sacree you cannot be reached but when i open it in chrome this error not shown please fix this.
creator: nelsonnoray

title: Limited functionality from mainland China?
content: Dear community, on both of my devices firefox does not function normally in recent days even though I run the latest version (websites do not open at all and all I see is a white screen with a firefox browser line). I am just curious whether other users from China reported similar problems which might indicate it is a China-related problem. Thank you! Warmly, Annette
creator: annette.hillers

title: Playing a video on Web Player automatically turns on camera
content: Sometimes when I play video on a Web Player, the camera turns on automatically, This happens on websites like Youtube, Prime or any other web player based page. I have tried updating Firefox, and re-installing camera application, but notthing works.
creator: shubhangamagrag

title: Adblock is unable to deactivate thumbnails in youtube video!
content:
Adblock is unable to deactivate thumbnails appearing towards the end of a Youtube video! I've restarted FF but result is the same.

What is wrong? Any other alternatives?
creator: RajeshPat

title: Home page
content: When I roll over a thumbnail of a web site on YOUTUBE it pops out and starts to play. How do I stop that?
creator: joen2001_99

title: STREETVIEW DOES NOT WORK IN GOOGLE MAPS
content:
